extension.name: Moot.it Integrator
extension.description:
Integrates the Moot.it Forum into Joomla.

USAGE

In any article, place the tag {mootit} to display the forum.
Use the tag {mootitblog} to display the blog.
Or, use the tag {mootitcomments} to dislay comments.
